revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Nexxt Solutions |model=Acrux 300 |revision=(ARN03304U1) |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/01/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=TP-LINK |manuf_model=TL-WR1043ND |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=X4YARN03304U1,TE7WR1043NX |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9132 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9132 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR9103 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8366RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Nexxt_XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^Nexxt_[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Acrux 300 Gigabit N Router}} :[http://www.nexxtsolutions.com/us/acrux-300 Product page]
"2050500178 Rev:1.1" appears to be silkscreened on the board. :Per the manual, the default SSID pattern is '''Nexxt_XXXXXX'''.
The manual also shows a sample MAC with a 6C:FD:B9 (''[[Proware]]'') OUI. :''[[TP-LINK]]'' is a ''[[Proware]]'' brand.
